A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The worst of all the Star Wars films.  Lame casino scene\, lame Luke story\, no depth is added to Rey when there could have been\, the movie feels drawn out\, and I have no attachment at the end\, no real questions or curiosity about the last film in the biggest movie franchise of all time.  Thats how bad RJ fudged this movie up.
